languages.text: {n}Маражай задумчиво щелкает пальцами.{/n} "Возвращайтесь на свои корабли. Мне нужно время — поразмыслить над ответом на мольбу Опустошительной бури".
{n}Marazhai snaps his fingers pensively.{/n} "Get back to your ships. I need time to contemplate my answer to the plea of the Reaving Tempest."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай задумчиво щелкает пальцами.{/n} "Возвращайтесь на свои корабли. Мне нужно время — поразмыслить над ответом на мольбу Опустошительной бури".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnippt nachdenklich mit den Fingern.{/n} "Geht zurück auf Eure Schiffe. Ich muss über meine Antwort auf die Bitte des plündernden Sturms nachdenken."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai snaps his fingers pensively.{/n} "Get back to your ships. I need time to contemplate my answer to the plea of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnippt nachdenklich mit den Fingern.{/n} "Geht zurück auf Eure Schiffe. Ich muss über meine Antwort auf die Bitte des plündernden Sturms nachdenken."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋若有所思地打了个响指。{/n}“回到你的船上去吧，我要花些时间考虑如何答复狂风阴谋团的请求。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai snaps his fingers pensively.{/n} "Get back to your ships. I need time to contemplate my answer to the plea of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋若有所思地打了个响指。{/n}“回到你的船上去吧，我要花些时间考虑如何答复狂风阴谋团的请求。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai claque des doigts, pensif.{/n} « Retournez à bord de vos vaisseaux. J'ai besoin de temps pour réfléchir à la requête de la Tempête ravageuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai snaps his fingers pensively.{/n} "Get back to your ships. I need time to contemplate my answer to the plea of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai claque des doigts, pensif.{/n} « Retournez à bord de vos vaisseaux. J'ai besoin de temps pour réfléchir à la requête de la Tempête ravageuse. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chasquea los dedos, pensativo.{/n} «Volved a vuestras naves. Necesito tiempo para meditar mi respuesta a la petición de la Tempestad Asoladora».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai snaps his fingers pensively.{/n} "Get back to your ships. I need time to contemplate my answer to the plea of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chasquea los dedos, pensativo.{/n} «Volved a vuestras naves. Necesito tiempo para meditar mi respuesta a la petición de la Tempestad Asoladora».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはぼんやりとしながら指を鳴らす。{/n}「船に戻っていろ。略奪の嵐の嘆願について考える時間が必要なんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai snaps his fingers pensively.{/n} "Get back to your ships. I need time to contemplate my answer to the plea of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはぼんやりとしながら指を鳴らす。{/n}「船に戻っていろ。略奪の嵐の嘆願について考える時間が必要なんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, dalgın bir tavırla parmağını şıklatıyor.{/n} "Gemilerinize dönün. Müfteris Kasırga'nın talebine ne yanıt vereceğimi düşünmek için zamana ihtiyacım var."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai snaps his fingers pensively.{/n} "Get back to your ships. I need time to contemplate my answer to the plea of the Reaving Tempest."
